summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NutriDive Food Ingredient Analyzer with new authentication system. All major features working perfectly including protected routes, login/register flows, common allergens detection, sample barcodes, and profile management.

integration_issues.issue: Session expires quickly requiring frequent re-login during testing
integration_issues.impact: User experience issue - sessions should persist longer

passed_tests: Landing page loads for non-logged users with Get Started and Sign In buttons
Scan page redirects to login if not authenticated
History page redirects to login if not authenticated
Analysis page redirects to login if not authenticated
Login flow works correctly with test@example.com / password123
Register page accessible with proper form (Name, Email, Password fields)
After login, Scan and History nav items appear in navigation
Scan page shows welcome message 'Welcome back, Test User!'
Sample barcodes work on scan page (Nutella, Coca-Cola, Barilla Pasta)
Analysis shows common allergens detected section with Dairy and Gluten for Nutella
NutriScore shows correct grade E (1/5) for both Nutella and Coca-Cola
Nutrition tab shows detailed values (Calories, Fat, Carbs, Sugar, etc.)
Key Ingredients accordion expandable with health impact details
Analysis confidence meter shows 95%
Profile page shows allergen settings with 6 categories (Nuts, Dairy, Gluten, Soy, Eggs, Shellfish)
History page shows scanned products with NutriScore grades and timestamps
Protected routes working correctly - all redirect to login when not authenticated
Navigation between pages works smoothly
User profile displays correct name and email
Food type badges display correctly (Vegetarian for Nutella)
Product categories display correctly (Breakfasts, Spreads, Sweet spreads)
Barcode input field functional with manual entry
Camera and Upload buttons visible and accessible
Sample barcode buttons with emojis and product names work correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider increasing authentication session duration to improve user experience. All core functionality working perfectly.
